segments.text: Hello . This is Dr . Galas Office . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I ’ d like to make an appointment with Dr . Galas . Could you arrange it for me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Let me check his schedule . How about tomorrow afternoon at 2:30 ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m not available tomorrow afternoon . How about tomorrow morning ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry . Dr . Galas is fully engaged tomorrow morning . How about the day after tomorrow at 9:30 in the morning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re welcome . Could I have your name and phone number , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . My name is Janet Smith , and my phone number is 610-555-1234 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good , Ms . Smith . I have scheduled an appointment for you on Wednesday at 9:30 am .
segments.speaker: S1
